article_node.title: Love's absence, Colts QB battle are feature attractions of joint practice with Packers
article_node.summary: During a joint practice between the Green Bay Packers and Indianapolis Colts, quarterback Jordan Love discussed his recent thumb surgery and his recovery timeline, aiming to be ready for the season opener against Detroit. Love expressed caution about returning to practice to avoid re-injury. Meanwhile, Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson is set to play extensively in the upcoming preseason game, despite recent injuries affecting his performance.
